game.name: Warstride Challenges
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Blast hordes of demons at lightning speed in bloody gunfights, and race against the clock to overcome everything that comes your way! Die and retry to get the highest score in increasingly intense trials. Create and share your own runs, enjoying hundreds of levels created by the community.
